LanguageData.Apparel_ShieldBeltAvali.label: avali shield belt
LanguageData.Apparel_ShieldBeltAvali.description: A single-person energy shield device. It will attempt to stop any rapidly-moving projectile or energy attack that comes from a distance. It does nothing against melee attacks or shots from point-blank range. It also prevents firing past touch range. This one was made using Avali force field shielding technology. It’s capacity is 3 times bigger but it takes twice as long to recharge.
LanguageData.Apparel_LifeSupportBeltAvali.label: Avali life support belt
LanguageData.Apparel_LifeSupportBeltAvali.description:
A single person life support device. It generates an invisible bubble that fully protects the user from environmental hazards. 

Do not protects from heat/cold. 
Not works well in hightly toxic enviroments.
